A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The cat, left to fend for itself when its owners move away, has gone feral and taken to stalking victims and ultimately murdering one and leaving her mauled. With the help of local policewoman Kathie Peil (Paula Ireland), they track and destroy the cat.
